features: DEEP CLEAN: Formulated with chamomile, aloe and soap bark, Burt's Bees creamy face wash is a rich cream cleanser that softens skin while providing a deep cleanse making skin feel and look like new

NATURAL FACE CLEANSER: Formulated without parabens, phthalates and petrolatum, Burt's Bees deep cream face cleanser is a 99% natural origin face wash that is non-irritating and gentle enough for daily use
CREAM FACIAL CLEANSER: Burt's Bees soap bark and chamomile creamy facial cleanser contains a hint of menthol to help cool and soothe leaving skin looking naturally healthy and beautiful
BURTS BEES CLEANSER: After gently cleansing your skin with Burt's Bee creamy facial cleanser, continue with your favorite Burt's Bees toner, cream or lotion for naturally beautiful skin
body.description: Gently clean and soften your skin with Burt's Bees Soap Bark and Chamomile Deep Cleansing Cream. This deep cleansing cream is formulated with natural soap bark to gently remove dirt, excess oil and makeup. Infused with chamomile and aloe to soften skin. Contains a hint of menthol, known for its cooling properties, to cool and revitalize skin. Its 98.2% natural origin and contains no parabens, phthalates, petrolatum or SLS. Leaves your skin looking beautiful and naturally healthy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this face wash. It's refreshing, leaves your face feeling clean and moisturized, and invigorated. It smells really good, and feels luxurious. Definitely does the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaves my face silky smooth
reviews.reviewText: The product has large my face smooth and moisturized. The feel of this face wash is minty and makes your face feel very clean and refreshed once you wash it off. The best facial wash I’ve ever purchased

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this face wash nightly for years and it works great. It’s rather gentle yet leaves a minty, tingling feeling if left on for a minute or two. It does a decent job at loosening up the remnants of makeup, but I still use a makeup wipe beforehand so this soap can really do its job. Sometimes I add half a teaspoon of sugar to make a face scrub.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is my 2nd purchase of 3 Burt's Bee Facial cleanser. I love it!!! I enjoy the fresh smell, it's creaminess and how it leaves your face clean and soft. I use it with a facial acrub brush. Awesome!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best face cleanser I've used so far!
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this face wash. I have very oily skin on my face and have tried several different types of face wash and never found one that I loved. They often made my face EXTREMELY dry after washing and caused my skin to peel, but they made my skin less oily. I decided to give this face wash a try in an attempt to switch to more natural products and I'm in LOVE. When I first started using it, it felt like it left a bit of a waxy residue on my face after washing, but after a week or so I think my skin adjusted because I don't get that feeling anymore. My skin feels very clean after using it and it doesn't leave my face dried out and peeling. I feel that my face has gotten less oily since I've started using it and I rarely get acne anymore. Plus, I love the smell and the menthol in it makes my face feel refreshed (or as my mom says, "it makes my face feel minty fresh!)! It is a lot thicker than other facial cleansers I've used, so it takes a bit more scrubbing to rinse it off my face, but it's definitely worth it for the results it's given me. I highly recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good cleanser to maintain healthy skin
reviews.reviewText: I've recently purchased my second bottle of this facewash, and I will likely repurchase. The smell is great and my skin is left moisturized with a slight cooling sensation. I use this only at night before my serum and rosehip seed oil, and I like that my face feels relaxed and clean. My skin is very soft after I use the cleanser; I can forgo other products and my skin doesn't feel tight or dry. I still get a hormonal pimple or two once a month, but my skin is otherwise clear and I attribute a part of this to the cleanser. A little goes a long way with regard to its spread; it's thick and foams up nicely. However, the cleanser doesn't always lift away makeup. I've found this pairs well with coconut oil applied first as a makeup remover, especially for eye, eyebrow, and shimmery products (blush/highlighter). I don't wear foundation, but the cleanser lifts away my concealer and cream based products. I think a very soft facial brush with work well with this product. This is worth it when looking for a more natural based face product that is reasonably priced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best deal I’ve gotten in awhile
reviews.reviewText: For we reason, Target stopped selling these consistently and I had to find an alternative store. Luckily, I got the biggest bang for my buck finding 3 for 20 instead of the one for 11$.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: 3 pk of a creamy, easy to rinse, daily facial cleanser at a great price!
Love this product and this was an INCREDIBLE deal AND it arrived in half the time I was given 😊 VERY HAPPY! Thank you kindly
This may be a different formula to a previous cleanser I received in a gift set. This is still very nice but not as refreshing.

Recomiendo muchísimo este limpiador facial. Lo uso desde hace 4 años y es de los pocos productos que no me maltrata la piel. La piel de mi cara es mixta-grasa y sensible y este limpiador cumple su función con buenos resultados y sin maltratar.
Mis favoritos, dejan la piel muy linda
